name: Wasteland Smashers
description:
Experience classic POGS game like never before! In this rouge-like action game build your Caps deck and use your Smashers' special powers to defeat enemies and win their Caps.

Find every Cap and Smasher for ultimate collection!

MANY FUN CAPS WITH SPECIAL POWERS TO COLLECT!

6 UNIQUE SMASHERS WITH POWERFUL ABILITIES!

3 ATMOSPHERIC BATTLE ARENAS!

I've put my childhood memories in this game, so if you liked it - please consider donating any amount.

Thank you and have fun!
